name: Chainspect
shortDescription: Chainspect is an independent blockchain analytics platform focused on technicals
description: Chainspect is an independent blockchain analytics platform focused on tracking technical metrics for your favorite networks, including Moonbeam. We track Real-Time TPS, Max Recorded TPS, Max Theoretical TPS, Block Time, TTF, and Governance Model with more metrics to come. The core of our platform is a dashboard with 30+ chains, but besides that, we have Chain Pages for each network we track and Compare Pages for comparing any two networks side by side.
